function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Wild animals leaving their natural habitat and moving into urban areas in search of food","Impact":"Increased interaction between wild animals and humans, leading to potential transmission of diseases","Mitigation":"Establishment of natural restaurants for wild animals, education of the public on not feeding wild animals, and strict enforcement of regulations against feeding wildlife","Technologies":"Public awareness campaigns, GPS tracking of animal movements, surveillance cameras in urban areas","People":"Local residents, tourists, government officials","Owner":"Local authorities, wildlife conservation organizations"},{"Description":"Conflict and competition among wild animals in urban areas","Impact":"Increased aggression and territorial disputes among wild animals, posing a threat to public safety","Mitigation":"Establishment of designated feeding areas, implementation of feeding schedules, and monitoring of animal behavior","Technologies":"GPS tracking of animal movements, surveillance cameras in urban areas, automated feeding systems","People":"Local residents, wildlife conservation organizations","Owner":"Local authorities, wildlife management organizations"},{"Description":"Nature rejuvenation leading to potential disruption of ecosystems","Impact":"Shift in ecological balance, affecting the population dynamics of species and their habitats","Mitigation":"Monitoring of ecosystem changes, scientific research on the impact of nature rejuvenation, and adaptive management strategies","Technologies":"Environmental monitoring sensors, remote sensing technology, ecological modeling and simulation software","People":"Scientists, environmentalists, conservationists","Owner":"Research institutions, environmental monitoring agencies"}]}
